LanguageData.Hopper.description: Holds resources for use by machines like gamer slop dispensers.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: gamer slop dispenser
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: A machine that synthesizes edible gamer slop from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating gamer slop. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
